txt.en: Gundabad raiding parties can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat Gundabad raid-leaders and collect dwarf-made weapons.
Lóssi can be found at Imrêkh-guthlu in Máttugard.\n\nYou should bring the dwarf-made weapons to Lóssi.

'The Orcs of the Deepscrave are becoming emboldened in their patrols. I have seen Orc raiding parties in Máttugard. They must be dealt with swiftly. We both know how fatal an ambush can be.\n\n'What angers me more is what the Orcs carry. They use ancient dwarf-made weapons, defiling dwarf-heritage with each and every swing! Please, recover these stolen artifacts, if you are able.'
Orc raiders from the Deepscrave are starting to venture out further into Máttugard.
'Thank you [placeholder]. These axes have finally been returned after many years of being mistreated. You have done well to end these raids.'
Bring the dwarf-made weapons to Lóssi
